line_2: But now o'ercharg'd with envy, rage, and guile,

line_2: The flowing Sulphur meets dissolving Steel,
Nae Poet thought her worth his while,
To set her name in measur'd style;
She lay like some unkend-of isle

line_1: Bacon and Dumpling in the Pot we boil,
line_2: Our Beds we make, our Swine we feed the while;
